en_translation: Let them live where you live ˹during their waiting period˺, according to your means. And do not harass them to make their stay unbearable. If they are pregnant, then maintain them until they deliver. And if they nurse your child, compensate them, and consult together courteously. But if you fail to reach an agreement, then another woman will nurse ˹the child˺ for the father

arabic_text: لِیُنفِقۡ ذُو سَعَةࣲ مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَیۡهِ رِزۡقُهُۥ فَلۡیُنفِقۡ مِمَّاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُۚ لَا یُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا مَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهَاۚ سَیَجۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بَعۡدَ عُسۡرࣲ یُسۡرࣰا
en_translation: Let the man of wealth provide according to his means. As for the one with limited resources, let him provide according to whatever Allah has given him. Allah does not require of any soul beyond what He has given it. After hardship, Allah will bring about ease

arabic_text: وَكَأَیِّن مِّن قَرۡیَةٍ عَتَتۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ فَحَاسَبۡنَـٰهَا حِسَابࣰا شَدِیدࣰا وَعَذَّبۡنَـٰهَا عَذَابࣰا نُّكۡرࣰا
en_translation: ˹Imagine˺ how many societies rebelled against the commandments of their Lord and His messengers, so We called each ˹society˺ to a severe account and subjected them to a horrible punishment

arabic_text: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا
en_translation: So they tasted the evil consequences of their doings, and the outcome of their doings was ˹total˺ loss

arabic_text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابࣰا شَدِیدࣰاۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ یَـٰۤأُو۟لِی ٱلۡأَلۡبَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ۚ قَدۡ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَیۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرࣰا
en_translation: Allah has ˹also˺ prepared for them a severe punishment. So fear Allah, O people of reason and faith. Allah has indeed revealed to you a Reminder

arabic_text: رَّسُولࣰا یَتۡلُوا۟ عَلَیۡكُمۡ ءَایَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَیِّنَـٰتࣲ لِّیُخۡرِجَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَمَن یُؤۡمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَیَعۡمَلۡ صَـٰلِحࣰا یُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۖ قَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ رِزۡقًا
en_translation: ˹and sent˺ a messenger reciting to you Allah’s revelations, making things clear so that He may bring those who believe and do good out of darkness and into light. And whoever believes in Allah and does good will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah will have indeed granted them an excellent provision

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَـٰوَ ٰتࣲ وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِثۡلَهُنَّۖ یَتَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَیۡنَهُنَّ لِتَعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ قَدِیرࣱ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءٍ عِلۡمَۢا
en_translation: Allah is the One Who created seven heavens ˹in layers˺, and likewise for the earth. The ˹divine˺ command descends between them so you may know that Allah is Most Capable of everything and that Allah certainly encompasses all things in ˹His˺ knowledge

arabic_text: ۞ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلنَّبِیُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَاۤ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِی مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَ ٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ
en_translation: O Prophet! Why do you prohibit ˹yourself˺ from what Allah has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives? And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

arabic_text: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَیۡمَـٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِیمُ ٱلۡحَكِیمُ
en_translation: Allah has already ordained for you ˹believers˺ the way to absolve yourselves from your oaths. For Allah is your Guardian. And He is the All-Knowing, All-Wise

arabic_text: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِیُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡوَ ٰجِهِۦ حَدِیثࣰا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتۡ بِهِۦ وَأَظۡهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَیۡهِ عَرَّفَ بَعۡضَهُۥ وَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۢ بَعۡضࣲۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَـٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِیَ ٱلۡعَلِیمُ ٱلۡخَبِیرُ
en_translation: ˹Remember˺ when the Prophet had ˹once˺ confided something to one of his wives, then when she disclosed it ˹to another wife˺ and Allah made it known to him, he presented ˹to her˺ part of what was disclosed and overlooked a part. So when he informed her of it, she exclaimed, “Who told you this?” He replied, “I was informed by the All-Knowing, All-Aware.”

arabic_text: إِن تَتُوبَاۤ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَاۖ وَإِن تَظَـٰهَرَا عَلَیۡهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِیلُ وَصَـٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَۖ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰۤئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذَ ٰلِكَ ظَهِیرٌ
en_translation: ˹It will be better˺ if you ˹wives˺ both turn to Allah in repentance, for your hearts have certainly faltered. But if you ˹continue to˺ collaborate against him, then ˹know that˺ Allah Himself is his Guardian. And Gabriel, the righteous believers, and the angels are ˹all˺ his supporters as well

arabic_text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥۤ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن یُبۡدِلَهُۥۤ أَزۡوَ ٰجًا خَیۡرࣰا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَـٰتࣲ مُّؤۡمِنَـٰتࣲ قَـٰنِتَـٰتࣲ تَـٰۤئِبَـٰتٍ عَـٰبِدَ ٰتࣲ سَـٰۤئِحَـٰتࣲ ثَیِّبَـٰتࣲ وَأَبۡكَارࣰا
en_translation: Perhaps, if he were to divorce you ˹all˺, his Lord would replace you with better wives who are submissive ˹to Allah˺, faithful ˹to Him˺, devout, repentant, dedicated to worship and fasting—previously married or virgins

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قُوۤا۟ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَهۡلِیكُمۡ نَارࣰا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُ عَلَیۡهَا مَلَـٰۤئِكَةٌ غِلَاظࣱ شِدَادࣱ لَّا یَعۡصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَاۤ أَمَرَهُمۡ وَیَفۡعَلُونَ مَا یُؤۡمَرُونَ
en_translation: O believers! Protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, overseen by formidable and severe angels, who never disobey whatever Allah orders—always doing as commanded

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُوا۟ ٱلۡیَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
en_translation: ˹The deniers will then be told,˺ “O disbelievers! Make no excuses this Day! You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ تُوبُوۤا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةࣰ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن یُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَیِّءَاتِكُمۡ وَیُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ یَوۡمَ لَا یُخۡزِی ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِیَّ وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ یَسۡعَىٰ بَیۡنَ أَیۡدِیهِمۡ وَبِأَیۡمَـٰنِهِمۡ یَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَاۤ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَاۤۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ قَدِیرࣱ
en_translation: O believers! Turn to Allah in sincere repentance, so your Lord may absolve you of your sins and admit you into Gardens, under which rivers flow, on the Day Allah will not disgrace the Prophet or the believers with him. Their light will shine ahead of them and on their right. They will say, “Our Lord! Perfect our light for us, and forgive us. ˹For˺ You are truly Most Capable of everything.”

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلنَّبِیُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقِینَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِیرُ
en_translation: O Prophet! Struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be firm with them. Hell will be their home. What an evil destination

arabic_text: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلࣰا لِّلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحࣲ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطࣲۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَیۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَـٰلِحَیۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ یُغۡنِیَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَیۡءࣰا وَقِیلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّ ٰخِلِینَ
en_translation: Allah sets forth an example for the disbelievers: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. Each was married to one of Our righteous servants, yet betrayed them. So their husbands were of no benefit to them against Allah whatsoever. Both were told, “Enter the Fire, along with the others!”

arabic_text: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلࣰا لِّلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِی عِندَكَ بَیۡتࣰا فِی ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِی مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِی مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ
en_translation: And Allah sets forth an example for the believers: the wife of Pharaoh, who prayed, “My Lord! Build me a house in Paradise near You, deliver me from Pharaoh and his ˹evil˺ doing, and save me from the wrongdoing people.”

arabic_text: وَمَرۡیَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَ ٰنَ ٱلَّتِیۤ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِیهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَـٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَـٰنِتِینَ
en_translation: ˹There is˺ also ˹the example of˺ Mary, the daughter of ’Imrân, who guarded her chastity, so We breathed into her ˹womb˺ through Our angel ˹Gabriel˺. She testified to the words of her Lord and His Scriptures, and was one of the ˹sincerely˺ devout

arabic_text: ۞ تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِی بِیَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ قَدِیرٌ
en_translation: Blessed is the One in Whose Hands rests all authority. And He is Most Capable of everything

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ لِیَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَیُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلࣰاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِیزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
en_translation: ˹He is the One˺ Who created death and life in order to test which of you is best in deeds. And He is the Almighty, All-Forgiving

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَـٰوَ ٰتࣲ طِبَاقࣰاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِی خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتࣲۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورࣲ
en_translation: ˹He is the One˺ Who created seven heavens, one above the other. You will never see any imperfection in the creation of the Most Compassionate. So look again: do you see any flaws

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَیۡنِ یَنقَلِبۡ إِلَیۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئࣰا وَهُوَ حَسِیرࣱ
en_translation: Then look again and again—your sight will return frustrated and weary

arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ زَیَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا بِمَصَـٰبِیحَ وَجَعَلۡنَـٰهَا رُجُومࣰا لِّلشَّیَـٰطِینِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِیرِ
en_translation: And indeed, We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps, and made them ˹as missiles˺ for stoning ˹eavesdropping˺ devils, for whom We have also prepared the torment of the Blaze

arabic_text: وَلِلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِیرُ
en_translation: Those who disbelieve in their Lord will suffer the punishment of Hell. What an evil destination

arabic_text: إِذَاۤ أُلۡقُوا۟ فِیهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِیقࣰا وَهِیَ تَفُورُ
en_translation: When they are tossed into it, they will hear its roaring as it boils over

arabic_text: تَكَادُ تَمَیَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَیۡظِۖ كُلَّمَاۤ أُلۡقِیَ فِیهَا فَوۡجࣱ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَاۤ أَلَمۡ یَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِیرࣱ
en_translation: almost bursting in fury. Every time a group is cast into it, its keepers will ask them, “Did a warner not come to you?”

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَاۤءَنَا نَذِیرࣱ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَیۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ كَبِیرࣲ
en_translation: They will reply, “Yes, a warner did come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has revealed nothing. You are extremely astray.’”

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِیۤ أَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِیرِ
en_translation: And they will lament, “If only we had listened and reasoned, we would not be among the residents of the Blaze!”

arabic_text: فَٱعۡتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسُحۡقࣰا لِّأَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِیرِ
en_translation: And so they will confess their sins. So away with the residents of the Blaze

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ یَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَیۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةࣱ وَأَجۡرࣱ كَبِیرࣱ
en_translation: Indeed, those in awe of their Lord without seeing Him will have forgiveness and a mighty reward

arabic_text: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦۤۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِیمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
en_translation: Whether you speak secretly or openly—He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart

arabic_text: أَلَا یَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِیفُ ٱلۡخَبِیرُ
en_translation: How could He not know His Own creation? For He ˹alone˺ is the Most Subtle, All-Aware

arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِی جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولࣰا فَٱمۡشُوا۟ فِی مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَیۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
en_translation: He is the One Who smoothed out the earth for you, so move about in its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection ˹of all˺

arabic_text: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِی ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ أَن یَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِیَ تَمُورُ
en_translation: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently

arabic_text: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِی ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ أَن یُرۡسِلَ عَلَیۡكُمۡ حَاصِبࣰاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَیۡفَ نَذِیرِ
en_translation: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones. Only then would you know how ˹serious˺ My warning was

arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ نَكِیرِ
en_translation: And certainly those before them denied ˹as well˺, then how severe was My response

arabic_text: أَوَ لَمۡ یَرَوۡا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّیۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَـٰۤفَّـٰتࣲ وَیَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا یُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءِۭ بَصِیرٌ
en_translation: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything

arabic_text: أَمَّنۡ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی هُوَ جُندࣱ لَّكُمۡ یَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِی غُرُورٍ
en_translation: Also, which ˹powerless˺ force will come to your help instead of the Most Compassionate? Indeed, the disbelievers are only ˹lost˺ in delusion

arabic_text: أَمَّنۡ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی یَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِی عُتُوࣲّ وَنُفُورٍ
en_translation: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion ˹to the truth˺

arabic_text: أَفَمَن یَمۡشِی مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦۤ أَهۡدَىٰۤ أَمَّن یَمۡشِی سَوِیًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَ ٰطࣲ مُّسۡتَقِیمࣲ
en_translation: Who is ˹rightly˺ guided: the one who crawls facedown or the one who walks upright on the Straight Path

arabic_text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَـٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡءِدَةَۚ قَلِیلࣰا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is the One Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِی ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَیۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
en_translation: ˹Also˺ say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.”

arabic_text: وَیَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَـٰدِقِینَ
en_translation: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَاۤ أَنَا۠ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only sent with a clear warning.”

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةࣰ سِیۤءَتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِیلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
en_translation: Then when they see the torment drawing near, the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy, and it will be said ˹to them˺, “This is what you claimed would never come.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَرَءَیۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِیَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِیَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن یُجِیرُ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِیمࣲ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Consider this: whether Allah causes me and those with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”

arabic_text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَیۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ فِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ مُّبِینࣲ
en_translation: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate—in Him ˹alone˺ we believe, and in Him ˹alone˺ we trust. You will soon know who is clearly astray.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَرَءَیۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَاۤؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرࣰا فَمَن یَأۡتِیكُم بِمَاۤءࣲ مَّعِینِۭ
en_translation: Say, “Consider this: if your water were to sink ˹into the earth˺, then who ˹else˺ could bring you flowing water?”

arabic_text: ۞ نۤۚ وَٱلۡقَلَمِ وَمَا یَسۡطُرُونَ
en_translation: Nũn. By the pen and what everyone writes

arabic_text: مَاۤ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجۡنُونࣲ
en_translation: By the grace of your Lord, you ˹O Prophet˺ are not insane

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجۡرًا غَیۡرَ مَمۡنُونࣲ
en_translation: You will certainly have a never-ending reward

arabic_text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِیمࣲ
en_translation: And you are truly ˹a man˺ of outstanding character

arabic_text: فَسَتُبۡصِرُ وَیُبۡصِرُونَ
en_translation: Soon you and the pagans will see

arabic_text: بِأَییِّكُمُ ٱلۡمَفۡتُونُ
en_translation: which of you is mad

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِیلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِینَ
en_translation: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided

arabic_text: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: So do not give in to the deniers

arabic_text: وَدُّوا۟ لَوۡ تُدۡهِنُ فَیُدۡهِنُونَ
en_translation: They wish you would compromise so they would yield ˹to you˺

arabic_text: وَلَا تُطِعۡ كُلَّ حَلَّافࣲ مَّهِینٍ
en_translation: And do not obey the despicable, vain oath-taker

arabic_text: هَمَّازࣲ مَّشَّاۤءِۭ بِنَمِیمࣲ
en_translation: slanderer, gossip-monger

arabic_text: مَّنَّاعࣲ لِّلۡخَیۡرِ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِیمٍ
en_translation: withholder of good, transgressor, evildoer

arabic_text: عُتُلِّۭ بَعۡدَ ذَ ٰلِكَ زَنِیمٍ
en_translation: brute, and—on top of all that—an illegitimate child

arabic_text: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالࣲ وَبَنِینَ
en_translation: Now, ˹simply˺ because he has been blessed with ˹abundant˺ wealth and children

arabic_text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَیۡهِ ءَایَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِیرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
en_translation: whenever Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”

arabic_text: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡخُرۡطُومِ
en_translation: We will soon mark his snout

arabic_text: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَـٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُوا۟ لَیَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِینَ
en_translation: Indeed, We have tested those ˹Meccans˺ as We tested the owners of the garden—when they swore they would surely harvest ˹all˺ its fruit in the early morning

arabic_text: وَلَا یَسۡتَثۡنُونَ
en_translation: leaving no thought for Allah’s Will

arabic_text: فَطَافَ عَلَیۡهَا طَاۤئِفࣱ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَاۤئِمُونَ
en_translation: Then it was struck by a torment from your Lord while they slept

arabic_text: فَأَصۡبَحَتۡ كَٱلصَّرِیمِ
en_translation: so it was reduced to ashes

arabic_text: فَتَنَادَوۡا۟ مُصۡبِحِینَ
en_translation: Then by daybreak they called out to each other

arabic_text: أَنِ ٱغۡدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَـٰرِمِینَ
en_translation: ˹saying,˺ “Go early to your harvest, if you want to pick ˹all˺ the fruit.”

arabic_text: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمۡ یَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ
en_translation: So they went off, whispering to one another

arabic_text: أَن لَّا یَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡیَوۡمَ عَلَیۡكُم مِّسۡكِینࣱ
en_translation: “Do not let any poor person enter your garden today.”

arabic_text: وَغَدَوۡا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرۡدࣲ قَـٰدِرِینَ
en_translation: And they proceeded early, totally fixated on their purpose

arabic_text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهَا قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا لَضَاۤلُّونَ
en_translation: But when they saw it ˹devastated˺, they cried, “We must have lost ˹our˺ way

arabic_text: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ
en_translation: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”

arabic_text: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
en_translation: The most sensible of them said, “Did I not urge you to say, ‘Allah willing.’?”

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ سُبۡحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَاۤ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِینَ
en_translation: They replied, “Glory be to our Lord! We have truly been wrongdoers.”

arabic_text: فَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضࣲ یَتَلَـٰوَمُونَ
en_translation: Then they turned on each other, throwing blame

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ یَـٰوَیۡلَنَاۤ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَـٰغِینَ
en_translation: They said, “Woe to us! We have certainly been transgressors

arabic_text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَاۤ أَن یُبۡدِلَنَا خَیۡرࣰا مِّنۡهَاۤ إِنَّاۤ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَ ٰغِبُونَ
en_translation: We trust our Lord will give us a better garden than this, ˹for˺ we are indeed turning to our Lord with hope.”

arabic_text: كَذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡءَاخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُوا۟ یَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: That is the ˹way of Our˺ punishment ˹in this world˺. But the punishment of the Hereafter is certainly far worse, if only they knew

arabic_text: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِیمِ
en_translation: Indeed, the righteous will have the Gardens of Bliss with their Lord

arabic_text: أَفَنَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِینَ كَٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
en_translation: Should We then treat those who have submitted like the wicked

arabic_text: مَا لَكُمۡ كَیۡفَ تَحۡكُمُونَ
en_translation: What is the matter with you? How do you judge

arabic_text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ كِتَـٰبࣱ فِیهِ تَدۡرُسُونَ
en_translation: Or do you have a scripture, in which you read

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِیهِ لَمَا تَخَیَّرُونَ
en_translation: that you will have whatever you choose

arabic_text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَیۡمَـٰنٌ عَلَیۡنَا بَـٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ
en_translation: Or do you have oaths binding on Us until the Day of Judgment that you will have whatever you decide

arabic_text: سَلۡهُمۡ أَیُّهُم بِذَ ٰلِكَ زَعِیمٌ
en_translation: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ which of them can guarantee all that

arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَاۤءُ فَلۡیَأۡتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَاۤئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِینَ
en_translation: Or do they have associate-gods ˹supporting this claim˺? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if what they say is true

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقࣲ وَیُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا یَسۡتَطِیعُونَ
en_translation: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the Shin ˹of Allah˺ will be bared, and the wicked will be asked to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so

arabic_text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَـٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةࣱۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُوا۟ یُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَـٰلِمُونَ
en_translation: with eyes downcast, totally covered with disgrace. For they were ˹always˺ called to prostrate ˹in the world˺ when they were fully capable ˹but they chose not to˺

arabic_text: فَذَرۡنِی وَمَن یُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِیثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَیۡثُ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: So leave to Me ˹O Prophet˺ those who reject this message. We will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend

arabic_text: وَأُمۡلِی لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ كَیۡدِی مَتِینٌ
en_translation: I ˹only˺ delay their end for a while, but My planning is flawless

arabic_text: أَمۡ تَسۡءَلُهُمۡ أَجۡرࣰا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمࣲ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
en_translation: Or are you asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt

arabic_text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبُ فَهُمۡ یَكۡتُبُونَ
en_translation: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺

arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومࣱ
en_translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not be like ˹Jonah,˺ the Man of the Whale, who cried out ˹to Allah˺, in total distress

arabic_text: لَّوۡلَاۤ أَن تَدَ ٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةࣱ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَاۤءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومࣱ
en_translation: Had he not been shown grace by his Lord, he would have certainly been cast onto the open ˹shore˺, still blameworthy

arabic_text: فَٱجۡتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِینَ
en_translation: Then his Lord chose him, making him one of the righteous

arabic_text: وَإِن یَكَادُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَیُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَـٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَیَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونࣱ
en_translation: The disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear ˹you recite˺ the Reminder, and say, “He is certainly a madman.”

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرࣱ لِّلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
en_translation: But it is simply a reminder to the whole world

arabic_text: ۞ ٱلۡحَاۤقَّةُ
en_translation: The Inevitable Hour

arabic_text: مَا ٱلۡحَاۤقَّةُ
en_translation: What is the Inevitable Hour

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَاۤقَّةُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَادُۢ بِٱلۡقَارِعَةِ
en_translation: ˹Both˺ Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِیَةِ
en_translation: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا عَادࣱ فَأُهۡلِكُوا۟ بِرِیحࣲ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِیَةࣲ
en_translation: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind

arabic_text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَیَالࣲ وَثَمَـٰنِیَةَ أَیَّامٍ حُسُومࣰاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِیهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِیَةࣲ
en_translation: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees

arabic_text: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِیَةࣲ
en_translation: Do you see any of them left alive

arabic_text: وَجَاۤءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
en_translation: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and ˹the people of˺ the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺ indulged in sin

arabic_text: فَعَصَوۡا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةࣰ رَّابِیَةً
en_translation: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip

arabic_text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَاۤءُ حَمَلۡنَـٰكُمۡ فِی ٱلۡجَارِیَةِ
en_translation: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you in the floating Ark ˹with Noah˺

arabic_text: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةࣰ وَتَعِیَهَاۤ أُذُنࣱ وَ ٰعِیَةࣱ
en_translation: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it

arabic_text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِی ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةࣱ وَ ٰحِدَةࣱ
en_translation: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast

arabic_text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةࣰ وَ ٰحِدَةࣰ
en_translation: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow

arabic_text: فَیَوۡمَئِذࣲ وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
en_translation: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass

arabic_text: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فَهِیَ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ وَاهِیَةࣱ
en_translation: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail

arabic_text: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰۤ أَرۡجَاۤئِهَاۚ وَیَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ ثَمَـٰنِیَةࣱ
en_translation: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight ˹mighty angels˺ will bear the Throne of your Lord above them

arabic_text: یَوۡمَئِذࣲ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِیَةࣱ
en_translation: You will then be presented ˹before Him for judgment˺, and none of your secrets will stay hidden

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِیَمِینِهِۦ فَیَقُولُ هَاۤؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِیَهۡ
en_translation: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry ˹happily˺, “Here ˹everyone˺! Read my record

arabic_text: إِنِّی ظَنَنتُ أَنِّی مُلَـٰقٍ حِسَابِیَهۡ
en_translation: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”

arabic_text: فَهُوَ فِی عِیشَةࣲ رَّاضِیَةࣲ
en_translation: They will be in a life of bliss

arabic_text: فِی جَنَّةٍ عَالِیَةࣲ
en_translation: in an elevated Garden

arabic_text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِیَةࣱ
en_translation: whose fruit will hang within reach

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشۡرَبُوا۟ هَنِیۤءَۢا بِمَاۤ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَیَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِیَةِ
en_translation: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَیَقُولُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِیَهۡ
en_translation: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry ˹bitterly˺, “I wish I had not been given my record

arabic_text: وَلَمۡ أَدۡرِ مَا حِسَابِیَهۡ
en_translation: nor known anything of my reckoning

arabic_text: یَـٰلَیۡتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلۡقَاضِیَةَ
en_translation: I wish death was the end

arabic_text: مَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنِّی مَالِیَهۡۜ
en_translation: My wealth has not benefited me

arabic_text: هَلَكَ عَنِّی سُلۡطَـٰنِیَهۡ
en_translation: My authority has been stripped from me.”

arabic_text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
en_translation: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize and shackle them

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱلۡجَحِیمَ صَلُّوهُ
en_translation: then burn them in Hell

arabic_text: ثُمَّ فِی سِلۡسِلَةࣲ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعࣰا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ
en_translation: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا یُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
en_translation: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest

arabic_text: وَلَا یَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینِ
en_translation: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor

arabic_text: فَلَیۡسَ لَهُ ٱلۡیَوۡمَ هَـٰهُنَا حَمِیمࣱ
en_translation: So this Day they will have no close friend here

arabic_text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡلِینࣲ
en_translation: nor any food except ˹oozing˺ pus

arabic_text: لَّا یَأۡكُلُهُۥۤ إِلَّا ٱلۡخَـٰطِءُونَ
en_translation: which none will eat except the evildoers.”

arabic_text: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِمَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
en_translation: Now, I do swear by whatever you see

arabic_text: وَمَا لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
en_translation: and whatever you cannot see

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولࣲ كَرِیمࣲ
en_translation: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the recitation of a noble Messenger

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرࣲۚ قَلِیلࣰا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ
en_translation: It is not the prose of a poet ˹as you claim˺, ˹yet˺ you hardly have any faith

arabic_text: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنࣲۚ قَلِیلࣰا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
en_translation: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, ˹yet˺ you are hardly mindful

arabic_text: تَنزِیلࣱ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds

arabic_text: وَلَوۡ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَیۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلۡأَقَاوِیلِ
en_translation: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name

arabic_text: لَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡهُ بِٱلۡیَمِینِ
en_translation: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ ٱلۡوَتِینَ
en_translation: then severed his aorta

arabic_text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَـٰجِزِینَ
en_translation: and none of you could have shielded him ˹from Us˺

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذۡكِرَةࣱ لِّلۡمُتَّقِینَ
en_translation: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder to those mindful ˹of Allah˺

arabic_text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ
en_translation: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلۡیَقِینِ
en_translation: And indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the absolute truth

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
en_translation: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest

arabic_text: سَأَلَ سَاۤئِلُۢ بِعَذَابࣲ وَاقِعࣲ
en_translation: A challenger has demanded a punishment bound to come

arabic_text: لِّلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ لَیۡسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعࣱ
en_translation: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—

arabic_text: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِی ٱلۡمَعَارِجِ
en_translation: from Allah, Lord of pathways of ˹heavenly˺ ascent

arabic_text: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَیۡهِ فِی یَوۡمࣲ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِینَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةࣲ
en_translation: ˹through which˺ the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length

arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ صَبۡرࣰا جَمِیلًا
en_translation: So endure ˹this denial, O Prophet,˺ with beautiful patience

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمۡ یَرَوۡنَهُۥ بَعِیدࣰا
en_translation: They truly see this ˹Day˺ as impossible

arabic_text: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِیبࣰا
en_translation: but We see it as inevitable

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ
en_translation: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass

arabic_text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ
en_translation: and the mountains like ˹tufts of˺ wool

arabic_text: وَلَا یَسۡءَلُ حَمِیمٌ حَمِیمࣰا
en_translation: And no close friend will ask ˹about˺ their friends

arabic_text: یُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ یَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ یَفۡتَدِی مِنۡ عَذَابِ یَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِیهِ
en_translation: ˹although˺ they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children

arabic_text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِیهِ
en_translation: their spouses, their siblings

arabic_text: وَفَصِیلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِی تُءۡوِیهِ
en_translation: their clan that sheltered them

arabic_text: وَمَن فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِیعࣰا ثُمَّ یُنجِیهِ
en_translation: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
en_translation: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame

arabic_text: نَزَّاعَةࣰ لِّلشَّوَىٰ
en_translation: ripping off scalps

arabic_text: تَدۡعُوا۟ مَنۡ أَدۡبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
en_translation: It will summon whoever turned their backs ˹on Allah˺ and turned away ˹from the truth˺

arabic_text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوۡعَىٰۤ
en_translation: and gathered and hoarded ˹wealth˺

arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
en_translation: Indeed, humankind was created impatient

arabic_text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعࣰا
en_translation: distressed when touched with evil

arabic_text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلۡخَیۡرُ مَنُوعًا
en_translation: and withholding when touched with good—

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلۡمُصَلِّینَ
en_translation: except those who pray

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ دَاۤئِمُونَ
en_translation: consistently performing their prayers

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ فِیۤ أَمۡوَ ٰلِهِمۡ حَقࣱّ مَّعۡلُومࣱ
en_translation: and who give the rightful share of their wealth

arabic_text: لِّلسَّاۤئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
en_translation: to the beggar and the poor

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ یُصَدِّقُونَ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: and who ˹firmly˺ believe in the Day of Judgment

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
en_translation: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَیۡرُ مَأۡمُونࣲ
en_translation: ˹knowing that˺ none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَـٰفِظُونَ
en_translation: and those who guard their chastity

arabic_text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰۤ أَزۡوَ ٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَیۡمَـٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَیۡرُ مَلُومِینَ
en_translation: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, for then they are free from blame

arabic_text: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَاۤءَ ذَ ٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
en_translation: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ رَ ٰعُونَ
en_translation: ˹The faithful are˺ also those who are true to their trusts and covenants

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ هُم بِشَهَـٰدَ ٰتِهِمۡ قَاۤئِمُونَ
en_translation: and who are honest in their testimony

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ یُحَافِظُونَ
en_translation: and who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ مُّكۡرَمُونَ
en_translation: These will be in Gardens, held in honour

arabic_text: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِعِینَ
en_translation: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush ˹head-long˺ towards you ˹O Prophet˺

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلۡیَمِینِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِینَ
en_translation: from the right and the left, in groups ˹to mock you˺

arabic_text: أَیَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِئࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن یُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِیمࣲ
en_translation: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤۖ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَـٰهُم مِّمَّا یَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: But no! Indeed, they ˹already˺ know what We created them from

arabic_text: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
en_translation: So, I do swear by the Lord of ˹all˺ the points of sunrise and sunset that We are truly capable

arabic_text: عَلَىٰۤ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَیۡرࣰا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِینَ
en_translation: of replacing them with ˹others˺ better than them, and We cannot be prevented ˹from doing so˺

arabic_text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ یَخُوضُوا۟ وَیَلۡعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ یُلَـٰقُوا۟ یَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِی یُوعَدُونَ
en_translation: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعࣰا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبࣲ یُوفِضُونَ
en_translation: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol ˹for a blessing˺

arabic_text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَـٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةࣱۚ ذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِی كَانُوا۟ یُوعَدُونَ
en_translation: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have ˹always˺ been warned of

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦۤ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن یَأۡتِیَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمࣱ
en_translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people ˹saying to him˺, “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.”

arabic_text: قَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّی لَكُمۡ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینٌ
en_translation: Noah proclaimed, “O my people! I am truly sent to you with a clear warning

arabic_text: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِیعُونِ
en_translation: worship Allah ˹alone˺, fear Him, and obey me

arabic_text: یَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَیُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰۤ أَجَلࣲ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَاۤءَ لَا یُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: He will forgive your sins, and delay your end until the appointed time. Indeed, when the time set by Allah comes, it cannot be delayed, if only you knew!”

arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّی دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِی لَیۡلࣰا وَنَهَارࣰا
en_translation: He cried, “My Lord! I have surely called my people day and night

arabic_text: فَلَمۡ یَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَاۤءِیۤ إِلَّا فِرَارࣰا
en_translation: but my calls only made them run farther away

arabic_text: وَإِنِّی كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوۤا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمۡ فِیۤ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡا۟ ثِیَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوا۟ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارࣰا
en_translation: And whenever I invite them to be forgiven by You, they press their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their clothes, persist ˹in denial˺, and act very arrogantly

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّی دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارࣰا
en_translation: Then I certainly called them openly

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّیۤ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارࣰا
en_translation: then I surely preached to them publicly and privately

arabic_text: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارࣰا
en_translation: saying, ‘Seek your Lord’s forgiveness, ˹for˺ He is truly Most Forgiving

arabic_text: یُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ عَلَیۡكُم مِّدۡرَارࣰا
en_translation: He will shower you with abundant rain

arabic_text: وَیُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَ ٰلࣲ وَبَنِینَ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَـٰرࣰا
en_translation: supply you with wealth and children, and give you gardens as well as rivers

arabic_text: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارࣰا
en_translation: What is the matter with you that you are not in awe of the Majesty of Allah

arabic_text: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
en_translation: when He truly created you in stages ˹of development˺

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡا۟ كَیۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَـٰوَ ٰتࣲ طِبَاقࣰا
en_translation: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens, one above the other

arabic_text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِیهِنَّ نُورࣰا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجࣰا
en_translation: placing the moon within them as a ˹reflected˺ light, and the sun as a ˹radiant˺ lamp

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتࣰا
en_translation: Allah ˹alone˺ caused you to grow from the earth like a plant

arabic_text: ثُمَّ یُعِیدُكُمۡ فِیهَا وَیُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجࣰا
en_translation: Then He will return you to it, and then simply bring you forth ˹again˺

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطࣰا
en_translation: And Allah ˹alone˺ spread out the earth for you

arabic_text: لِّتَسۡلُكُوا۟ مِنۡهَا سُبُلࣰا فِجَاجࣰا
en_translation: to walk along its spacious pathways.’”

arabic_text: قَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِی وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمۡ یَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥۤ إِلَّا خَسَارࣰا
en_translation: ˹Eventually,˺ Noah cried, “My Lord! They have certainly persisted in disobeying me, and followed ˹instead˺ those ˹elite˺ whose ˹abundant˺ wealth and children only increase them in loss

arabic_text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكۡرࣰا كُبَّارࣰا
en_translation: and who have devised a tremendous plot

arabic_text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدࣰّا وَلَا سُوَاعࣰا وَلَا یَغُوثَ وَیَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرࣰا
en_translation: urging ˹their followers˺, ‘Do not abandon your idols—especially Wadd, Suwâ’, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.’

arabic_text: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِیرࣰاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلࣰا
en_translation: Those ˹elite˺ have already led many astray. So ˹O Lord˺, only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away.”

arabic_text: مِّمَّا خَطِیۤءَـٰتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُوا۟ فَأُدۡخِلُوا۟ نَارࣰا فَلَمۡ یَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارࣰا
en_translation: So because of their sins, they were drowned, then admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help them against Allah

arabic_text: وَقَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ دَیَّارًا
en_translation: Noah had prayed, “My Lord! Do not leave a single disbeliever on earth

arabic_text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ یُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا یَلِدُوۤا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرࣰا كَفَّارࣰا
en_translation: For if You spare ˹any of˺ them, they will certainly mislead Your servants, and give birth only to ˹wicked˺ sinners, staunch disbelievers

arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِی وَلِوَ ٰلِدَیَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَیۡتِیَ مُؤۡمِنࣰا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
en_translation: My Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house in faith, and ˹all˺ believing men and women. And increase the wrongdoers only in destruction.”

arabic_text: ۞ قُلۡ أُوحِیَ إِلَیَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبࣰا
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened ˹to the Quran,˺ and said ˹to their fellow jinn˺: ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation

arabic_text: یَهۡدِیۤ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَاۤ أَحَدࣰا
en_translation: It leads to Right Guidance so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord ˹in worship˺

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةࣰ وَلَا وَلَدࣰا
en_translation: ˹Now, we believe that˺ our Lord—Exalted is His Majesty—has neither taken a mate nor offspring

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ یَقُولُ سَفِیهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطࣰا
en_translation: and that the foolish of us used to utter ˹outrageous˺ falsehoods about Allah

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبࣰا
en_translation: We certainly thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ یَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقࣰا
en_translation: And some men used to seek refuge with some jinn—so they increased each other in wickedness

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن یَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدࣰا
en_translation: And those ˹humans˺ thought, just like you ˹jinn˺, that Allah would not resurrect anyone ˹for judgment˺

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ فَوَجَدۡنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسࣰا شَدِیدࣰا وَشُهُبࣰا
en_translation: ˹Earlier˺ we tried to reach heaven ˹for news˺, only to find it filled with stern guards and shooting stars

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن یَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡءَانَ یَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابࣰا رَّصَدࣰا
en_translation: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but whoever dares eavesdrop now will find a flare lying in wait for them

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِیۤ أَشَرٌّ أُرِیدَ بِمَن فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدࣰا
en_translation: Now, we have no clue whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends for them what is right

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَ ٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَاۤئِقَ قِدَدࣰا
en_translation: Among us are those who are righteous and those who are less so. We have been of different factions

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبࣰا
en_translation: ˹Now,˺ we truly know that we cannot frustrate Allah on earth, nor can we escape from Him ˹into heaven˺

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن یُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا یَخَافُ بَخۡسࣰا وَلَا رَهَقࣰا
en_translation: When we heard the guidance ˹of the Quran˺, we ˹readily˺ believed in it. For whoever believes in their Lord will have no fear of being denied ˹a reward˺ or wronged

arabic_text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡا۟ رَشَدࣰا
en_translation: And among us are those who have submitted ˹to Allah˺ and those who are deviant. So ˹as for˺ those who submitted, it is they who have attained Right Guidance

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبࣰا
en_translation: And as for the deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”

arabic_text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِیقَةِ لَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰهُم مَّاۤءً غَدَقࣰا
en_translation: Had the deniers followed the Right Way, We would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink—

arabic_text: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِیهِۚ وَمَن یُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ یَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابࣰا صَعَدࣰا
en_translation: as a test for them. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of their Lord will be admitted by Him into an overwhelming punishment

arabic_text: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣰا
en_translation: The places of worship are ˹only˺ for Allah, so do not invoke anyone besides Him

arabic_text: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ یَدۡعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ یَكُونُونَ عَلَیۡهِ لِبَدࣰا
en_translation: Yet when the servant of Allah stood up calling upon Him ˹alone˺, the pagans almost swarmed over him

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَدۡعُوا۟ رَبِّی وَلَاۤ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦۤ أَحَدࣰا
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I call only upon my Lord, associating none with Him ˹in worship˺.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَاۤ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرࣰّا وَلَا رَشَدࣰا
en_translation: Say, “It is not in my power to harm or benefit you.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَن یُجِیرَنِی مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣱ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
en_translation: Say, “No one can protect me from Allah ˹if I were to disobey Him˺, nor can I find any refuge other than Him

arabic_text: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغࣰا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن یَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدًا
en_translation: ˹My duty is˺ only to convey ˹the truth˺ from Allah and ˹deliver˺ His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there for ever and ever

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰۤ إِذَا رَأَوۡا۟ مَا یُوعَدُونَ فَسَیَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرࣰا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدࣰا
en_translation: Only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِیۤ أَقَرِیبࣱ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ یَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّیۤ أَمَدًا
en_translation: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has set a distant time for it

arabic_text: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ فَلَا یُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَیۡبِهِۦۤ أَحَدًا
en_translation: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the unseen, disclosing none of it to anyone

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولࣲ فَإِنَّهُۥ یَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَیۡنِ یَدَیۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدࣰا
en_translation: except messengers of His choice. Then He appoints angel-guards before and behind them

arabic_text: لِّیَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَیۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
en_translation: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He ˹already˺ knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُزَّمِّلُ
en_translation: O you wrapped ˹in your clothes˺

arabic_text: قُمِ ٱلَّیۡلَ إِلَّا قَلِیلࣰا
en_translation: Stand all night ˹in prayer˺ except a little—

arabic_text: نِّصۡفَهُۥۤ أَوِ ٱنقُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِیلًا
en_translation: ˹pray˺ half the night, or a little less

arabic_text: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَیۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِیلًا
en_translation: or a little more—and recite the Quran ˹properly˺ in a measured way

arabic_text: إِنَّا سَنُلۡقِی عَلَیۡكَ قَوۡلࣰا ثَقِیلًا
en_translation: ˹For˺ We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation

arabic_text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّیۡلِ هِیَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡءࣰا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِیلًا
en_translation: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِی ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحࣰا طَوِیلࣰا
en_translation: For during the day you are over-occupied ˹with worldly duties˺

arabic_text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَیۡهِ تَبۡتِیلࣰا
en_translation: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly

arabic_text: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَاۤ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِیلࣰا
en_translation: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the east and the west. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, so take Him ˹alone˺ as a Trustee of Affairs

arabic_text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا یَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرࣰا جَمِیلࣰا
en_translation: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say, and depart from them courteously

arabic_text: وَذَرۡنِی وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ أُو۟لِی ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِیلًا
en_translation: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while

arabic_text: إِنَّ لَدَیۡنَاۤ أَنكَالࣰا وَجَحِیمࣰا
en_translation: ˹For˺ We certainly have shackles, a ˹raging˺ Fire

arabic_text: وَطَعَامࣰا ذَا غُصَّةࣲ وَعَذَابًا أَلِیمࣰا
en_translation: choking food, and a painful punishment ˹in store for them˺

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِیبࣰا مَّهِیلًا
en_translation: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake ˹violently˺, and mountains will be ˹reduced to˺ dunes of shifting sand

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡكُمۡ رَسُولࣰا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَیۡكُمۡ كَمَاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولࣰا
en_translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh

arabic_text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُ أَخۡذࣰا وَبِیلࣰا
en_translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip

arabic_text: فَكَیۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ یَوۡمࣰا یَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَ ٰنَ شِیبًا
en_translation: If you ˹pagans˺ persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against ˹the horrors of˺ a Day which will turn children’s hair grey

arabic_text: ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
en_translation: It will ˹even˺ cause the sky to split apart. His promise ˹of judgment˺ must be fulfilled

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةࣱۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِیلًا
en_translation: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord

arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ یَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَیِ ٱلَّیۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَاۤئِفَةࣱ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِینَ مَعَكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ یُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّیۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحۡصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَیۡكُمۡۖ فَٱقۡرَءُوا۟ مَا تَیَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَیَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرۡضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ یَضۡرِبُونَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ یَبۡتَغُونَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ یُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَٱقۡرَءُوا۟ مَا تَیَسَّرَ مِنۡهُۚ وَأَقِیمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقۡرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنࣰاۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَیۡرࣲ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَیۡرࣰا وَأَعۡظَمَ أَجۡرࣰاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمُۢ
en_translation: Surely your Lord knows that you ˹O Prophet˺ stand ˹in prayer˺ for nearly two-thirds of the night, or ˹sometimes˺ half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah ˹alone˺ keeps a ˹precise˺ measure of the day and night. He knows that you ˹believers˺ are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy. So recite ˹in prayer˺ whatever you can from the Quran. He knows that some of you will be sick, some will be travelling throughout the land seeking Allah’s bounty, and some fighting in the cause of Allah. So recite whatever you can from it. And ˹continue to˺ perform ˹regular˺ prayers, pay alms-tax, and lend to Allah a good loan. Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah far better and more rewarding. And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُدَّثِّرُ
en_translation: O you covered up ˹in your clothes˺

arabic_text: قُمۡ فَأَنذِرۡ
en_translation: Arise and warn ˹all˺

arabic_text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ
en_translation: Revere your Lord ˹alone˺

arabic_text: وَثِیَابَكَ فَطَهِّرۡ
en_translation: Purify your garments

arabic_text: وَٱلرُّجۡزَ فَٱهۡجُرۡ
en_translation: ˹Continue to˺ shun idols

arabic_text: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ
en_translation: Do not do a favour expecting more ˹in return˺

arabic_text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصۡبِرۡ
en_translation: And persevere for ˹the sake of˺ your Lord

arabic_text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِی ٱلنَّاقُورِ
en_translation: ˹For˺ when the Trumpet will be sounded

arabic_text: فَذَ ٰلِكَ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ یَوۡمٌ عَسِیرٌ
en_translation: that will ˹truly˺ be a difficult Day—

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ غَیۡرُ یَسِیرࣲ
en_translation: far from easy for the disbelievers

arabic_text: ذَرۡنِی وَمَنۡ خَلَقۡتُ وَحِیدࣰا
en_translation: And leave to me ˹O Prophet˺ the one I created all by Myself

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُۥ مَالࣰا مَّمۡدُودࣰا
en_translation: and granted him abundant wealth

arabic_text: وَبَنِینَ شُهُودࣰا
en_translation: and children always by his side

arabic_text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِیدࣰا
en_translation: and made life very easy for him

arabic_text: ثُمَّ یَطۡمَعُ أَنۡ أَزِیدَ
en_translation: Yet he is hungry for more

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَایَـٰتِنَا عَنِیدࣰا
en_translation: But no! ˹For˺ he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations

arabic_text: سَأُرۡهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
en_translation: I will make his fate unbearable

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
en_translation: for he contemplated and determined ˹a degrading label for the Quran˺

arabic_text: فَقُتِلَ كَیۡفَ قَدَّرَ
en_translation: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined

arabic_text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَیۡفَ قَدَّرَ
en_translation: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined

arabic_text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
en_translation: Then he re-contemplated ˹in frustration˺

arabic_text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
en_translation: then frowned and scowled

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
en_translation: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly

arabic_text: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَـٰذَاۤ إِلَّا سِحۡرࣱ یُؤۡثَرُ
en_translation: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients

arabic_text: إِنۡ هَـٰذَاۤ إِلَّا قَوۡلُ ٱلۡبَشَرِ
en_translation: This is no more than the word of a man.”

arabic_text: سَأُصۡلِیهِ سَقَرَ
en_translation: Soon I will burn him in Hell

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what Hell is

arabic_text: لَا تُبۡقِی وَلَا تَذَرُ
en_translation: It does not let anyone live or die

arabic_text: لَوَّاحَةࣱ لِّلۡبَشَرِ
en_translation: scorching the skin

arabic_text: عَلَیۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ
en_translation: It is overseen by nineteen ˹keepers˺

arabic_text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰۤئِكَةࣰۖ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةࣰ لِّلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِیَسۡتَیۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ وَیَزۡدَادَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ إِیمَـٰنࣰا وَلَا یَرۡتَابَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَلِیَقُولَ ٱلَّذِینَ فِی قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضࣱ وَٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَاۤ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلࣰاۚ كَذَ ٰلِكَ یُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن یَشَاۤءُ وَیَهۡدِی مَن یَشَاۤءُۚ وَمَا یَعۡلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَمَا هِیَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡبَشَرِ
en_translation: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity

arabic_text: كَلَّا وَٱلۡقَمَرِ
en_translation: But no! By the moon

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذۡ أَدۡبَرَ
en_translation: and the night as it retreats

arabic_text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَاۤ أَسۡفَرَ
en_translation: and the day as it breaks

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحۡدَى ٱلۡكُبَرِ
en_translation: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—

arabic_text: نَذِیرࣰا لِّلۡبَشَرِ
en_translation: a warning to humankind

arabic_text: لِمَن شَاۤءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن یَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ یَتَأَخَّرَ
en_translation: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind

arabic_text: كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ رَهِینَةٌ
en_translation: Every soul will be detained for what it has done

arabic_text: إِلَّاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبَ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
en_translation: except the people of the right

arabic_text: فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ یَتَسَاۤءَلُونَ
en_translation: who will be in Gardens, asking one another

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
en_translation: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺

arabic_text: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِی سَقَرَ
en_translation: “What has landed you in Hell?”

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ لَمۡ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصَلِّینَ
en_translation: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed

arabic_text: وَلَمۡ نَكُ نُطۡعِمُ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینَ
en_translation: nor did we feed the poor

arabic_text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَاۤئِضِینَ
en_translation: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others

arabic_text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: and deny the Day of Judgment

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰۤ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلۡیَقِینُ
en_translation: until the inevitable came to us.”

arabic_text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَـٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِینَ
en_translation: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِینَ
en_translation: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ حُمُرࣱ مُّسۡتَنفِرَةࣱ
en_translation: as if they were spooked zebras

arabic_text: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ
en_translation: fleeing from a lion

arabic_text: بَلۡ یُرِیدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِئࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن یُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفࣰا مُّنَشَّرَةࣰ
en_translation: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا یَخَافُونَ ٱلۡءَاخِرَةَ
en_translation: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةࣱ
en_translation: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder

arabic_text: فَمَن شَاۤءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
en_translation: So let whoever wills be mindful of it

arabic_text: وَمَا یَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ
en_translation: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive

arabic_text: ۞ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ
en_translation: I do swear by the Day of Judgment

arabic_text: وَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
en_translation: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul

arabic_text: أَیَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجۡمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
en_translation: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones

arabic_text: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِینَ عَلَىٰۤ أَن نُّسَوِّیَ بَنَانَهُۥ
en_translation: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips

arabic_text: بَلۡ یُرِیدُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ لِیَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
en_translation: Still people want to deny what is yet to come

arabic_text: یَسۡءَلُ أَیَّانَ یَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ
en_translation: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”

arabic_text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ
en_translation: But when the sight is stunned

arabic_text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
en_translation: and the moon is dimmed

arabic_text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ
en_translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together

arabic_text: یَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ یَوۡمَئِذٍ أَیۡنَ ٱلۡمَفَرُّ
en_translation: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
en_translation: But no! There will be no refuge

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ یَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقَرُّ
en_translation: On that Day all will end up before your Lord

arabic_text: یُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ یَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
en_translation: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِیرَةࣱ
en_translation: In fact, people will testify against their own souls

arabic_text: وَلَوۡ أَلۡقَىٰ مَعَاذِیرَهُۥ
en_translation: despite the excuses they come up with

arabic_text: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦۤ
en_translation: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ
en_translation: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it

arabic_text: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَـٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ
en_translation: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا بَیَانَهُۥ
en_translation: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺

arabic_text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ
en_translation: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world

arabic_text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡءَاخِرَةَ
en_translation: and neglect the Hereafter

arabic_text: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ نَّاضِرَةٌ
en_translation: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةࣱ
en_translation: looking at their Lord

arabic_text: وَوُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَاسِرَةࣱ
en_translation: And ˹other˺ faces will be gloomy

arabic_text: تَظُنُّ أَن یُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةࣱ
en_translation: anticipating something devastating to befall them

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِیَ
en_translation: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺

arabic_text: وَقِیلَ مَنۡۜ رَاقࣲ
en_translation: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”

arabic_text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ
en_translation: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart

arabic_text: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
en_translation: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ یَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ
en_translation: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺

arabic_text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
en_translation: This denier neither believed nor prayed

arabic_text: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
en_translation: but persisted in denial and turned away

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ یَتَمَطَّىٰۤ
en_translation: then went to their own people, walking boastfully

arabic_text: أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰ
en_translation: Woe to you, and more woe

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰۤ
en_translation: Again, woe to you, and even more woe

arabic_text: أَیَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ أَن یُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
en_translation: Do people think they will be left without purpose

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ یَكُ نُطۡفَةࣰ مِّن مَّنِیࣲّ یُمۡنَىٰ
en_translation: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةࣰ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
en_translation: Then they became a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He developed and perfected their form

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ ٱلزَّوۡجَیۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۤ
en_translation: producing from it both sexes, male and female

arabic_text: أَلَیۡسَ ذَ ٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰۤ أَن یُحۡـِۧیَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
en_translation: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنِ حِینࣱ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ یَكُن شَیۡءࣰا مَّذۡكُورًا
en_translation: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning

arabic_text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجࣲ نَّبۡتَلِیهِ فَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُ سَمِیعَۢا بَصِیرًا
en_translation: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see

arabic_text: إِنَّا هَدَیۡنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِیلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرࣰا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
en_translation: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغۡلَـٰلࣰا وَسَعِیرًا
en_translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ یَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسࣲ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
en_translation: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—

arabic_text: عَیۡنࣰا یَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ یُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِیرࣰا
en_translation: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will

arabic_text: یُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَیَخَافُونَ یَوۡمࣰا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِیرࣰا
en_translation: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror

arabic_text: وَیُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِینࣰا وَیَتِیمࣰا وَأَسِیرًا
en_translation: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive

arabic_text: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِیدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَاۤءࣰ وَلَا شُكُورًا
en_translation: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you

arabic_text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا یَوۡمًا عَبُوسࣰا قَمۡطَرِیرࣰا
en_translation: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”

arabic_text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةࣰ وَسُرُورࣰا
en_translation: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy

arabic_text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةࣰ وَحَرِیرࣰا
en_translation: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk

arabic_text: مُّتَّكِءِینَ فِیهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤئِكِۖ لَا یَرَوۡنَ فِیهَا شَمۡسࣰا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِیرࣰا
en_translation: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold

arabic_text: وَدَانِیَةً عَلَیۡهِمۡ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِیلࣰا
en_translation: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach

arabic_text: وَیُطَافُ عَلَیۡهِم بِءَانِیَةࣲ مِّن فِضَّةࣲ وَأَكۡوَابࣲ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِیرَا۠
en_translation: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—

arabic_text: قَوَارِیرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةࣲ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِیرࣰا
en_translation: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired

arabic_text: وَیُسۡقَوۡنَ فِیهَا كَأۡسࣰا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِیلًا
en_translation: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger

arabic_text: عَیۡنࣰا فِیهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِیلࣰا
en_translation: from a spring there, called Salsabîl

arabic_text: ۞ وَیَطُوفُ عَلَیۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَ ٰنࣱ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَیۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤࣰا مَّنثُورࣰا
en_translation: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَیۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَیۡتَ نَعِیمࣰا وَمُلۡكࣰا كَبِیرًا
en_translation: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom

arabic_text: عَـٰلِیَهُمۡ ثِیَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرࣱ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقࣱۖ وَحُلُّوۤا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةࣲ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابࣰا طَهُورًا
en_translation: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَاۤءࣰ وَكَانَ سَعۡیُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
en_translation: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”

arabic_text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَیۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِیلࣰا
en_translation: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages

arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورࣰا
en_translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them

arabic_text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةࣰ وَأَصِیلࣰا
en_translation: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening

arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَیۡلࣰا طَوِیلًا
en_translation: and prostrate before Him during part of the night, and glorify Him long at night

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ یُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَیَذَرُونَ وَرَاۤءَهُمۡ یَوۡمࣰا ثَقِیلࣰا
en_translation: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them

arabic_text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَـٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَاۤ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَاۤ أَمۡثَـٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِیلًا
en_translation: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةࣱۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِیلࣰا
en_translation: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord

arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَاۤءُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِیمًا حَكِیمࣰا
en_translation: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise

arabic_text: یُدۡخِلُ مَن یَشَاۤءُ فِی رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِیمَۢا
en_translation: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment

arabic_text: وَٱلۡمُرۡسَلَـٰتِ عُرۡفࣰا
en_translation: By those ˹winds˺ sent forth successively

arabic_text: فَٱلۡعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصۡفࣰا
en_translation: and those blowing violently

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَ ٰتِ نَشۡرࣰا
en_translation: and those scattering ˹rainclouds˺ widely

arabic_text: فَٱلۡفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرۡقࣰا
en_translation: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُلۡقِیَـٰتِ ذِكۡرًا
en_translation: and those delivering revelation

arabic_text: عُذۡرًا أَوۡ نُذۡرًا
en_translation: ending excuses and giving warnings

arabic_text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَ ٰقِعࣱ
en_translation: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass

arabic_text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ
en_translation: So when the stars are put out

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فُرِجَتۡ
en_translation: and the sky is torn apart

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ
en_translation: and the mountains are blown away

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتۡ
en_translation: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—

arabic_text: لِأَیِّ یَوۡمٍ أُجِّلَتۡ
en_translation: for which Day has all this been set

arabic_text: لِیَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
en_translation: For the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نُهۡلِكِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
en_translation: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers

arabic_text: ثُمَّ نُتۡبِعُهُمُ ٱلۡءَاخِرِینَ
en_translation: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them

arabic_text: كَذَ ٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
en_translation: This is how We deal with the wicked

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاۤءࣲ مَّهِینࣲ
en_translation: Did We not create you from a humble fluid

arabic_text: فَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُ فِی قَرَارࣲ مَّكِینٍ
en_translation: placing it in a secure place

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرࣲ مَّعۡلُومࣲ
en_translation: until an appointed time

arabic_text: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَـٰدِرُونَ
en_translation: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا
en_translation: Have We not made the earth a lodging

arabic_text: أَحۡیَاۤءࣰ وَأَمۡوَ ٰتࣰا
en_translation: for the living and the dead

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِیهَا رَوَ ٰسِیَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتࣲ وَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰكُم مَّاۤءࣰ فُرَاتࣰا
en_translation: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: ٱنطَلِقُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
en_translation: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny

arabic_text: ٱنطَلِقُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلࣲّ ذِی ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبࣲ
en_translation: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns

arabic_text: لَّا ظَلِیلࣲ وَلَا یُغۡنِی مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
en_translation: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِی بِشَرَرࣲ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ
en_translation: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتࣱ صُفۡرࣱ
en_translation: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا یَوۡمُ لَا یَنطِقُونَ
en_translation: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak

arabic_text: وَلَا یُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَیَعۡتَذِرُونَ
en_translation: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: هَـٰذَا یَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَـٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
en_translation: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺

arabic_text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَیۡدࣱ فَكِیدُونِ
en_translation: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی ظِلَـٰلࣲ وَعُیُونࣲ
en_translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs

arabic_text: وَفَوَ ٰكِهَ مِمَّا یَشۡتَهُونَ
en_translation: and any fruit they desire

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشۡرَبُوا۟ هَنِیۤءَۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
en_translation: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَذَ ٰلِكَ نَجۡزِی ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِینَ
en_translation: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِیلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ
en_translation: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِیلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُوا۟ لَا یَرۡكَعُونَ
en_translation: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers

arabic_text: فَبِأَیِّ حَدِیثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ یُؤۡمِنُونَ
en_translation: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in

arabic_text: ۞ عَمَّ یَتَسَاۤءَلُونَ
en_translation: What are they asking one another about

arabic_text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
en_translation: About the momentous news

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی هُمۡ فِیهِ مُخۡتَلِفُونَ
en_translation: over which they disagree

arabic_text: كَلَّا سَیَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: But no! They will come to know

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَیَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: Again, no! They will come to know

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِهَـٰدࣰا
en_translation: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺

arabic_text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَوۡتَادࣰا
en_translation: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs

arabic_text: وَخَلَقۡنَـٰكُمۡ أَزۡوَ ٰجࣰا
en_translation: and created you in pairs

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا نَوۡمَكُمۡ سُبَاتࣰا
en_translation: and made your sleep for rest

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّیۡلَ لِبَاسࣰا
en_translation: and made the night as a cover

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشࣰا
en_translation: and made the day for livelihood

arabic_text: وَبَنَیۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعࣰا شِدَادࣰا
en_translation: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺

arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجࣰا وَهَّاجࣰا
en_translation: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp

arabic_text: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُعۡصِرَ ٰتِ مَاۤءࣰ ثَجَّاجࣰا
en_translation: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water

arabic_text: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبࣰّا وَنَبَاتࣰا
en_translation: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants

arabic_text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا
en_translation: and dense orchards

arabic_text: إِنَّ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِیقَـٰتࣰا
en_translation: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یُنفَخُ فِی ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجࣰا
en_translation: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds

arabic_text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَ ٰبࣰا
en_translation: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates

arabic_text: وَسُیِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا
en_translation: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage

arabic_text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادࣰا
en_translation: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush

arabic_text: لِّلطَّـٰغِینَ مَءَابࣰا
en_translation: as a home for the transgressors

arabic_text: لَّـٰبِثِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَحۡقَابࣰا
en_translation: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages

arabic_text: لَّا یَذُوقُونَ فِیهَا بَرۡدࣰا وَلَا شَرَابًا
en_translation: There they will not taste any coolness or drink

arabic_text: إِلَّا حَمِیمࣰا وَغَسَّاقࣰا
en_translation: except boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus—

arabic_text: جَزَاۤءࣰ وِفَاقًا
en_translation: a fitting reward

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ لَا یَرۡجُونَ حِسَابࣰا
en_translation: For they never expected any reckoning

arabic_text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِءَایَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابࣰا
en_translation: and totally rejected Our signs

arabic_text: وَكُلَّ شَیۡءٍ أَحۡصَیۡنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبࣰا
en_translation: And We have everything recorded precisely

arabic_text: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِیدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
en_translation: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”

arabic_text: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ مَفَازًا
en_translation: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—

arabic_text: حَدَاۤئِقَ وَأَعۡنَـٰبࣰا
en_translation: Gardens, vineyards

arabic_text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتۡرَابࣰا
en_translation: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age

arabic_text: وَكَأۡسࣰا دِهَاقࣰا
en_translation: and full cups ˹of pure wine˺

arabic_text: لَّا یَسۡمَعُونَ فِیهَا لَغۡوࣰا وَلَا كِذَّ ٰبࣰا
en_translation: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—

arabic_text: جَزَاۤءࣰ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاۤءً حِسَابࣰا
en_translation: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord

arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَیۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِۖ لَا یَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابࣰا
