en_translation: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰۤئِكَةُ صَفࣰّاۖ لَّا یَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابࣰا
en_translation: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true

arabic_text: ذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَءَابًا
en_translation: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَنذَرۡنَـٰكُمۡ عَذَابࣰا قَرِیبࣰا یَوۡمَ یَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ یَدَاهُ وَیَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی كُنتُ تُرَ ٰبَۢا
en_translation: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرۡقࣰا
en_translation: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشۡطࣰا
en_translation: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبۡحࣰا
en_translation: and those gliding ˹through heavens˺ swiftly

arabic_text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبۡقࣰا
en_translation: and those taking the lead vigorously

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُدَبِّرَ ٰتِ أَمۡرࣰا
en_translation: and those conducting affairs ˹obediently˺

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
en_translation: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass

arabic_text: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
en_translation: followed by a second Blast

arabic_text: قُلُوبࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ وَاجِفَةٌ
en_translation: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺

arabic_text: أَبۡصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةࣱ
en_translation: with their eyes downcast

arabic_text: یَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِی ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ
en_translation: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state

arabic_text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمࣰا نَّخِرَةࣰ
en_translation: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”

arabic_text: قَالُوا۟ تِلۡكَ إِذࣰا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةࣱ
en_translation: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”

arabic_text: فَإِنَّمَا هِیَ زَجۡرَةࣱ وَ ٰحِدَةࣱ
en_translation: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast

arabic_text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
en_translation: and at once they will be above ground

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ مُوسَىٰۤ
en_translation: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺

arabic_text: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
en_translation: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa

arabic_text: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
en_translation: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺

arabic_text: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰۤ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
en_translation: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself

arabic_text: وَأَهۡدِیَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ
en_translation: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”

arabic_text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡءَایَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
en_translation: Then Moses showed him the great sign

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
en_translation: but he denied and disobeyed ˹Allah˺

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ یَسۡعَىٰ
en_translation: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺

arabic_text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
en_translation: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out

arabic_text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
en_translation: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”

arabic_text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰۤ
en_translation: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next

arabic_text: إِنَّ فِی ذَ ٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةࣰ لِّمَن یَخۡشَىٰۤ
en_translation: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺

arabic_text: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
en_translation: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it

arabic_text: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
en_translation: raising it high and forming it flawlessly

arabic_text: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَیۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
en_translation: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَ ٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَاۤ
en_translation: As for the earth, He spread it out as well

arabic_text: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَاۤءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا
en_translation: bringing forth its water and pastures

arabic_text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا
en_translation: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—

arabic_text: مَتَـٰعࣰا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَـٰمِكُمۡ
en_translation: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals

arabic_text: فَإِذَا جَاۤءَتِ ٱلطَّاۤمَّةُ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
en_translation: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
en_translation: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving

arabic_text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِیمُ لِمَن یَرَىٰ
en_translation: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
en_translation: then as for those who transgressed

arabic_text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا
en_translation: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَحِیمَ هِیَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
en_translation: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ
en_translation: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ هِیَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
en_translation: Paradise will certainly be ˹their˺ home

arabic_text: یَسۡءَلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَیَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا
en_translation: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”

arabic_text: فِیمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَاۤ
en_translation: But it is not for you to tell its time

arabic_text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَاۤ
en_translation: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺

arabic_text: إِنَّمَاۤ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن یَخۡشَىٰهَا
en_translation: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it

arabic_text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ یَوۡمَ یَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ یَلۡبَثُوۤا۟ إِلَّا عَشِیَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
en_translation: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning

arabic_text: ۞ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰۤ
en_translation: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away

arabic_text: أَن جَاۤءَهُ ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ
en_translation: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺

arabic_text: وَمَا یُدۡرِیكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ یَزَّكَّىٰۤ
en_translation: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified

arabic_text: أَوۡ یَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰۤ
en_translation: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder

arabic_text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
en_translation: As for the one who was indifferent

arabic_text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
en_translation: you gave him your ˹undivided˺ attention

arabic_text: وَمَا عَلَیۡكَ أَلَّا یَزَّكَّىٰ
en_translation: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاۤءَكَ یَسۡعَىٰ
en_translation: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺

arabic_text: وَهُوَ یَخۡشَىٰ
en_translation: being in awe ˹of Allah˺

arabic_text: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
en_translation: you were inattentive to him

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةࣱ
en_translation: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder

arabic_text: فَمَن شَاۤءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
en_translation: So let whoever wills be mindful of it

arabic_text: فِی صُحُفࣲ مُّكَرَّمَةࣲ
en_translation: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—

arabic_text: مَّرۡفُوعَةࣲ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
en_translation: highly esteemed, purified—

arabic_text: بِأَیۡدِی سَفَرَةࣲ
en_translation: by the hands of angel-scribes

arabic_text: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةࣲ
en_translation: honourable and virtuous

arabic_text: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَاۤ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
en_translation: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺

arabic_text: مِنۡ أَیِّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
en_translation: From what substance did He create them

arabic_text: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
en_translation: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development

arabic_text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِیلَ یَسَّرَهُۥ
en_translation: Then He makes the way easy for them

arabic_text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
en_translation: then causes them to die and be buried

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاۤءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
en_translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَمَّا یَقۡضِ مَاۤ أَمَرَهُۥ
en_translation: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered

arabic_text: فَلۡیَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦۤ
en_translation: Let people then consider their food

arabic_text: أَنَّا صَبَبۡنَا ٱلۡمَاۤءَ صَبࣰّا
en_translation: how We pour down rain in abundance

arabic_text: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقࣰّا
en_translation: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺

arabic_text: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِیهَا حَبࣰّا
en_translation: causing grain to grow in it

arabic_text: وَعِنَبࣰا وَقَضۡبࣰا
en_translation: as well as grapes and greens

arabic_text: وَزَیۡتُونࣰا وَنَخۡلࣰا
en_translation: and olives and palm trees

arabic_text: وَحَدَاۤئِقَ غُلۡبࣰا
en_translation: and dense orchards

arabic_text: وَفَـٰكِهَةࣰ وَأَبࣰّا
en_translation: and fruit and fodder—

arabic_text: مَّتَـٰعࣰا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَـٰمِكُمۡ
en_translation: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals

arabic_text: فَإِذَا جَاۤءَتِ ٱلصَّاۤخَّةُ
en_translation: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِیهِ
en_translation: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings

arabic_text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِیهِ
en_translation: and ˹even˺ their mother and father

arabic_text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِیهِ
en_translation: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children

arabic_text: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِئࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ شَأۡنࣱ یُغۡنِیهِ
en_translation: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own

arabic_text: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ مُّسۡفِرَةࣱ
en_translation: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright

arabic_text: ضَاحِكَةࣱ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةࣱ
en_translation: laughing and rejoicing

arabic_text: وَوُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَیۡهَا غَبَرَةࣱ
en_translation: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty

arabic_text: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
en_translation: cast in gloom—

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ
en_translation: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners

arabic_text: إِذَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ
en_translation: When the sun is put out

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the stars fall down

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ سُیِّرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the mountains are blown away

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ
en_translation: and when pregnant camels are left untended

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ
en_translation: and when wild beasts are gathered together

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the seas are set on fire

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ
en_translation: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتۡ
en_translation: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked

arabic_text: بِأَیِّ ذَنۢبࣲ قُتِلَتۡ
en_translation: for what crime they were put to death

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ كُشِطَتۡ
en_translation: and when the sky is stripped away

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِیمُ سُعِّرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ
en_translation: and when Paradise is brought near—

arabic_text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّاۤ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
en_translation: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along

arabic_text: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلۡخُنَّسِ
en_translation: I do swear by the receding stars

arabic_text: ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡكُنَّسِ
en_translation: which travel and hide

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
en_translation: and the night as it falls

arabic_text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
en_translation: and the day as it breaks

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولࣲ كَرِیمࣲ
en_translation: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel

arabic_text: ذِی قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِی ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِینࣲ
en_translation: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne

arabic_text: مُّطَاعࣲ ثَمَّ أَمِینࣲ
en_translation: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy

arabic_text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونࣲ
en_translation: And your fellow man is not insane

arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡمُبِینِ
en_translation: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَیۡبِ بِضَنِینࣲ
en_translation: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَیۡطَـٰنࣲ رَّجِیمࣲ
en_translation: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil

arabic_text: فَأَیۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ
en_translation: So what ˹other˺ path would you take

arabic_text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرࣱ لِّلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
en_translation: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—

arabic_text: لِمَن شَاۤءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن یَسۡتَقِیمَ
en_translation: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way

arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَاۤءُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
en_translation: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds

arabic_text: ۞ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ
en_translation: When the sky splits open

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the stars fall away

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the seas burst forth

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ
en_translation: and when the graves spill out

arabic_text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
en_translation: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِیمِ
en_translation: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
en_translation: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design

arabic_text: فِیۤ أَیِّ صُورَةࣲ مَّا شَاۤءَ رَكَّبَكَ
en_translation: moulding you in whatever form He willed

arabic_text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ عَلَیۡكُمۡ لَحَـٰفِظِینَ
en_translation: while you are certainly observed by vigilant

arabic_text: كِرَامࣰا كَـٰتِبِینَ
en_translation: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺

arabic_text: یَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
en_translation: They know whatever you do

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِی نَعِیمࣲ
en_translation: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِی جَحِیمࣲ
en_translation: and the wicked will be in Hell

arabic_text: یَصۡلَوۡنَهَا یَوۡمَ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: burning in it on Judgment Day

arabic_text: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَاۤئِبِینَ
en_translation: and they will have no escape from it

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is

arabic_text: ثُمَّ مَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسࣱ لِّنَفۡسࣲ شَیۡءࣰاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلَّهِ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِینَ
en_translation: Woe to the defrauders

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ یَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
en_translation: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people

arabic_text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ یُخۡسِرُونَ
en_translation: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers

arabic_text: أَلَا یَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
en_translation: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected

arabic_text: لِیَوۡمٍ عَظِیمࣲ
en_translation: for a tremendous Day—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
en_translation: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِی سِجِّینࣲ
en_translation: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn ˹in the depths of Hell˺—

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّینࣱ
en_translation: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—

arabic_text: كِتَـٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ
en_translation: a fate ˹already˺ sealed

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
en_translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers—

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ یُكَذِّبُونَ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: those who deny Judgment Day

arabic_text: وَمَا یُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦۤ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِیمٍ
en_translation: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor

arabic_text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَیۡهِ ءَایَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِیرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
en_translation: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ
en_translation: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
en_translation: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلۡجَحِیمِ
en_translation: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell

arabic_text: ثُمَّ یُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
en_translation: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِی عِلِّیِّینَ
en_translation: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺—

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّیُّونَ
en_translation: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—

arabic_text: كِتَـٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ
en_translation: a fate ˹already˺ sealed

arabic_text: یَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
en_translation: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِی نَعِیمٍ
en_translation: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤئِكِ یَنظُرُونَ
en_translation: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around

arabic_text: تَعۡرِفُ فِی وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِیمِ
en_translation: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight

arabic_text: یُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِیقࣲ مَّخۡتُومٍ
en_translation: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine

arabic_text: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكࣱۚ وَفِی ذَ ٰلِكَ فَلۡیَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
en_translation: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺

arabic_text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِیمٍ
en_translation: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—

arabic_text: عَیۡنࣰا یَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
en_translation: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ أَجۡرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ یَضۡحَكُونَ
en_translation: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers

arabic_text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمۡ یَتَغَامَزُونَ
en_translation: wink to one another whenever they passed by

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِینَ
en_translation: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ لَضَاۤلُّونَ
en_translation: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أُرۡسِلُوا۟ عَلَیۡهِمۡ حَـٰفِظِینَ
en_translation: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers

arabic_text: فَٱلۡیَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ یَضۡحَكُونَ
en_translation: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤئِكِ یَنظُرُونَ
en_translation: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on

arabic_text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَفۡعَلُونَ
en_translation: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”

arabic_text: ۞ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ
en_translation: When the sky bursts open

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
en_translation: obeying its Lord as it must

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
en_translation: and when the earth is flattened out

arabic_text: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِیهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
en_translation: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
en_translation: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰا فَمُلَـٰقِیهِ
en_translation: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِیَمِینِهِۦ
en_translation: As for those who are given their record in their right hand

arabic_text: فَسَوۡفَ یُحَاسَبُ حِسَابࣰا یَسِیرࣰا
en_translation: they will have an easy reckoning

arabic_text: وَیَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورࣰا
en_translation: and will return to their people joyfully

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
en_translation: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs

arabic_text: فَسَوۡفَ یَدۡعُوا۟ ثُبُورࣰا
en_translation: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction

arabic_text: وَیَصۡلَىٰ سَعِیرًا
en_translation: and will burn in the blazing Fire

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِیۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
en_translation: For they used to be prideful among their people

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن یَحُورَ
en_translation: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺

arabic_text: بَلَىٰۤۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِیرࣰا
en_translation: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them

arabic_text: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
en_translation: So, I do swear by the twilight

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
en_translation: And by the night and whatever it envelops

arabic_text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
en_translation: And by the moon when it waxes full

arabic_text: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقࣲ
en_translation: You will certainly pass from one state to another

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ
en_translation: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا یَ̅سۡ̅جُ̅دُ̅و̅نَ̅ ۩
en_translation: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ یُكَذِّبُونَ
en_translation: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا یُوعُونَ
en_translation: But Allah knows best whatever they hide

arabic_text: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِیمٍ
en_translation: So give them good news of a painful punishment

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
en_translation: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ
en_translation: By the sky full of constellations

arabic_text: وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
en_translation: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺

arabic_text: وَشَاهِدࣲ وَمَشۡهُودࣲ
en_translation: and the witness and what is witnessed

arabic_text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ
en_translation: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—

arabic_text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
en_translation: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel—

arabic_text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَیۡهَا قُعُودࣱ
en_translation: when they sat around it

arabic_text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا یَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ شُهُودࣱ
en_translation: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers

arabic_text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّاۤ أَن یُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِیزِ ٱلۡحَمِیدِ
en_translation: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ شَهِیدٌ
en_translation: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ یَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِیقِ
en_translation: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣱ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُۚ ذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِیرُ
en_translation: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph

arabic_text: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِیدٌ
en_translation: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ یُبۡدِئُ وَیُعِیدُ
en_translation: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺

arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
en_translation: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—

arabic_text: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِیدُ
en_translation: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious

arabic_text: فَعَّالࣱ لِّمَا یُرِیدُ
en_translation: Doer of whatever He wills

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ
en_translation: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—

arabic_text: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
en_translation: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِی تَكۡذِیبࣲ
en_translation: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَاۤئِهِم مُّحِیطُۢ
en_translation: But Allah encompasses them from all sides

arabic_text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانࣱ مَّجِیدࣱ
en_translation: In fact, this is a glorious Quran

arabic_text: فِی لَوۡحࣲ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ
en_translation: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
en_translation: By the heaven and the nightly star

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is

arabic_text: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness

arabic_text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسࣲ لَّمَّا عَلَیۡهَا حَافِظࣱ
en_translation: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺

arabic_text: فَلۡیَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
en_translation: Let people then consider what they were created from

arabic_text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاۤءࣲ دَافِقࣲ
en_translation: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid

arabic_text: یَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَیۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَاۤئِبِ
en_translation: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرࣱ
en_translation: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَاۤئِرُ
en_translation: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةࣲ وَلَا نَاصِرࣲ
en_translation: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ
en_translation: By the sky with its recurring cycles

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ
en_translation: and the earth with its sprouting plants

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلࣱ فَصۡلࣱ
en_translation: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ
en_translation: and is not to be taken lightly

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمۡ یَكِیدُونَ كَیۡدࣰا
en_translation: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans

arabic_text: وَأَكِیدُ كَیۡدࣰا
en_translation: but I too am planning

arabic_text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَیۡدَۢا
en_translation: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while

arabic_text: ۞ سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
en_translation: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
en_translation: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِی قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
en_translation: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِیۤ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ
en_translation: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَاۤءً أَحۡوَىٰ
en_translation: then reduces it to withered chaff

arabic_text: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰۤ
en_translation: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَا شَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ یَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا یَخۡفَىٰ
en_translation: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden

arabic_text: وَنُیَسِّرُكَ لِلۡیُسۡرَىٰ
en_translation: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
en_translation: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺

arabic_text: سَیَذَّكَّرُ مَن یَخۡشَىٰ
en_translation: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺

arabic_text: وَیَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
en_translation: But it will be shunned by the most wretched

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی یَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
en_translation: who will burn in the greatest Fire

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَا یَمُوتُ فِیهَا وَلَا یَحۡیَىٰ
en_translation: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die

arabic_text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
en_translation: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves

arabic_text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
en_translation: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray

arabic_text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا
en_translation: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world

arabic_text: وَٱلۡءَاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ وَأَبۡقَىٰۤ
en_translation: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِی ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
en_translation: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—

arabic_text: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَ ٰهِیمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
en_translation: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ٱلۡغَـٰشِیَةِ
en_translation: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺

arabic_text: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ
en_translation: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast

arabic_text: عَامِلَةࣱ نَّاصِبَةࣱ
en_translation: ˹totally˺ overburdened, exhausted

arabic_text: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِیَةࣰ
en_translation: burning in a scorching Fire

arabic_text: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَیۡنٍ ءَانِیَةࣲ
en_translation: left to drink from a scalding spring

arabic_text: لَّیۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِیعࣲ
en_translation: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub

arabic_text: لَّا یُسۡمِنُ وَلَا یُغۡنِی مِن جُوعࣲ
en_translation: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger

arabic_text: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ نَّاعِمَةࣱ
en_translation: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss

arabic_text: لِّسَعۡیِهَا رَاضِیَةࣱ
en_translation: ˹fully˺ pleased with their striving

arabic_text: فِی جَنَّةٍ عَالِیَةࣲ
en_translation: in an elevated Garden

arabic_text: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِیهَا لَـٰغِیَةࣰ
en_translation: where no idle talk will be heard

arabic_text: فِیهَا عَیۡنࣱ جَارِیَةࣱ
en_translation: In it will be a running spring

arabic_text: فِیهَا سُرُرࣱ مَّرۡفُوعَةࣱ
en_translation: along with thrones raised high

arabic_text: وَأَكۡوَابࣱ مَّوۡضُوعَةࣱ
en_translation: and cups set at hand

arabic_text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةࣱ
en_translation: and ˹fine˺ cushions lined up

arabic_text: وَزَرَابِیُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
en_translation: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out

arabic_text: أَفَلَا یَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَیۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
en_translation: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ كَیۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
en_translation: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَیۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
en_translation: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَیۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
en_translation: and the earth—how it was levelled out

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرࣱ
en_translation: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind

arabic_text: لَّسۡتَ عَلَیۡهِم بِمُصَۣیۡطِرٍ
en_translation: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
en_translation: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief

arabic_text: فَیُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
en_translation: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَیۡنَاۤ إِیَابَهُمۡ
en_translation: Surely to Us is their return

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
en_translation: then surely with Us is their reckoning

arabic_text: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ
en_translation: By the dawn

arabic_text: وَلَیَالٍ عَشۡرࣲ
en_translation: and the ten nights

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ
en_translation: and the even and the odd

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَسۡرِ
en_translation: and the night when it passes

arabic_text: هَلۡ فِی ذَ ٰلِكَ قَسَمࣱ لِّذِی حِجۡرٍ
en_translation: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَیۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
en_translation: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—

arabic_text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ
en_translation: ˹the people˺ of Iram—with ˹their˺ great stature

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِی لَمۡ یُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِی ٱلۡبِلَـٰدِ
en_translation: unmatched in any other land

arabic_text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِینَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ
en_translation: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley

arabic_text: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِی ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
en_translation: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ طَغَوۡا۟ فِی ٱلۡبِلَـٰدِ
en_translation: They all transgressed throughout the land

arabic_text: فَأَكۡثَرُوا۟ فِیهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ
en_translation: spreading much corruption there

arabic_text: فَصَبَّ عَلَیۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
en_translation: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
en_translation: ˹For˺ your Lord is truly vigilant

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَیَقُولُ رَبِّیۤ أَكۡرَمَنِ
en_translation: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”

arabic_text: وَأَمَّاۤ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَیۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَیَقُولُ رَبِّیۤ أَهَـٰنَنِ
en_translation: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡیَتِیمَ
en_translation: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan

arabic_text: وَلَا تَحَـٰۤضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینِ
en_translation: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor

arabic_text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلࣰا لَّمࣰّا
en_translation: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily

arabic_text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبࣰّا جَمࣰّا
en_translation: and love wealth fervently

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكࣰّا دَكࣰّا
en_translation: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over

arabic_text: وَجَاۤءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفࣰّا صَفࣰّا
en_translation: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank

arabic_text: وَجِا۟یۤءَ یَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ یَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
en_translation: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then

arabic_text: یَقُولُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَیَاتِی
en_translation: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”

arabic_text: فَیَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّا یُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥۤ أَحَدࣱ
en_translation: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other

arabic_text: وَلَا یُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥۤ أَحَدࣱ
en_translation: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other

arabic_text: یَـٰۤأَیَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
en_translation: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul

arabic_text: ٱرۡجِعِیۤ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِیَةࣰ مَّرۡضِیَّةࣰ
en_translation: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺

arabic_text: فَٱدۡخُلِی فِی عِبَـٰدِی
en_translation: So join My servants

arabic_text: وَٱدۡخُلِی جَنَّتِی
en_translation: and enter My Paradise.”

arabic_text: ۞ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
en_translation: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—

arabic_text: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
en_translation: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—

arabic_text: وَوَالِدࣲ وَمَا وَلَدَ
en_translation: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child

arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ فِی كَبَدٍ
en_translation: Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle

arabic_text: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن یَقۡدِرَ عَلَیۡهِ أَحَدࣱ
en_translation: Do they think that no one has power over them

arabic_text: یَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالࣰا لُّبَدًا
en_translation: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”

arabic_text: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ یَرَهُۥۤ أَحَدٌ
en_translation: Do they think that no one sees them

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَیۡنَیۡنِ
en_translation: Have We not given them two eyes

arabic_text: وَلِسَانࣰا وَشَفَتَیۡنِ
en_translation: a tongue, and two lips

arabic_text: وَهَدَیۡنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَیۡنِ
en_translation: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺

arabic_text: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ
en_translation: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is

arabic_text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
en_translation: It is to free a slave

arabic_text: أَوۡ إِطۡعَـٰمࣱ فِی یَوۡمࣲ ذِی مَسۡغَبَةࣲ
en_translation: or to give food in times of famine

arabic_text: یَتِیمࣰا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
en_translation: to an orphaned relative

arabic_text: أَوۡ مِسۡكِینࣰا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةࣲ
en_translation: or to a poor person in distress

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
en_translation: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion

arabic_text: أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَیۡمَنَةِ
en_translation: These are the people of the right

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِءَایَـٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡءَمَةِ
en_translation: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left

arabic_text: عَلَیۡهِمۡ نَارࣱ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
en_translation: The Fire will be sealed over them

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
en_translation: By the sun and its brightness

arabic_text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
en_translation: and the moon as it follows it

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
en_translation: and the day as it unveils it

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَغۡشَىٰهَا
en_translation: and the night as it conceals it

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
en_translation: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
en_translation: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it

arabic_text: وَنَفۡسࣲ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
en_translation: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it

arabic_text: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
en_translation: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it

arabic_text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
en_translation: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul

arabic_text: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
en_translation: and doomed is the one who corrupts it

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَاۤ
en_translation: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance

arabic_text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
en_translation: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺

arabic_text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡیَـٰهَا
en_translation: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
en_translation: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground

arabic_text: وَلَا یَخَافُ عُقۡبَـٰهَا
en_translation: He has no fear of consequences

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَغۡشَىٰ
en_translation: By the night when it covers

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
en_translation: and the day when it shines

arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۤ
en_translation: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female

arabic_text: إِنَّ سَعۡیَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ
en_translation: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
en_translation: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺

arabic_text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
en_translation: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward

arabic_text: فَسَنُیَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡیُسۡرَىٰ
en_translation: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
en_translation: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺

arabic_text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
en_translation: and ˹staunchly˺ denies the finest reward

arabic_text: فَسَنُیَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
en_translation: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship

arabic_text: وَمَا یُغۡنِی عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥۤ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰۤ
en_translation: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
en_translation: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
en_translation: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next

arabic_text: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارࣰا تَلَظَّىٰ
en_translation: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire

arabic_text: لَا یَصۡلَىٰهَاۤ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
en_translation: in which none will burn except the most wretched—

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
en_translation: who deny and turn away

arabic_text: وَسَیُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
en_translation: But the righteous will be spared from it—

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی یُؤۡتِی مَالَهُۥ یَتَزَكَّىٰ
en_translation: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves

arabic_text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةࣲ تُجۡزَىٰۤ
en_translation: not in return for someone’s favours

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَاۤءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
en_translation: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High

arabic_text: وَلَسَوۡفَ یَرۡضَىٰ
en_translation: They will certainly be pleased

arabic_text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
en_translation: By the morning sunlight

arabic_text: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
en_translation: and the night when it falls still

arabic_text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
en_translation: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺

arabic_text: وَلَلۡءَاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
en_translation: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one

arabic_text: وَلَسَوۡفَ یُعۡطِیكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰۤ
en_translation: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ یَجِدۡكَ یَتِیمࣰا فَءَاوَىٰ
en_translation: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَاۤلࣰّا فَهَدَىٰ
en_translation: Did He not find you unguided then guided you

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَاۤئِلࣰا فَأَغۡنَىٰ
en_translation: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡیَتِیمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
en_translation: So do not oppress the orphan

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّاۤئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
en_translation: nor repulse the beggar

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
en_translation: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord

arabic_text: ۞ أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
en_translation: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺

arabic_text: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
en_translation: relieved you of the burden

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
en_translation: which weighed so heavily on your back

arabic_text: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
en_translation: and elevated your renown for you

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرًا
en_translation: So, surely with hardship comes ease

arabic_text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرࣰا
en_translation: Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease

arabic_text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
en_translation: So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺

arabic_text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب
en_translation: turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope

arabic_text: وَٱلتِّینِ وَٱلزَّیۡتُونِ
en_translation: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺

arabic_text: وَطُورِ سِینِینَ
en_translation: and Mount Sinai

arabic_text: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِینِ
en_translation: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺

arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ فِیۤ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِیمࣲ
en_translation: Indeed, We created humans in the best form

arabic_text: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَـٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَـٰفِلِینَ
en_translation: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونࣲ
en_translation: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward

arabic_text: فَمَا یُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment

arabic_text: أَلَیۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَـٰكِمِینَ
en_translation: Is Allah not the most just of all judges

arabic_text: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ
en_translation: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—

arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
en_translation: created humans from a clinging clot

arabic_text: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ
en_translation: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ
en_translation: Who taught by the pen—

arabic_text: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمۡ یَعۡلَمۡ
en_translation: taught humanity what they knew not

arabic_text: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لَیَطۡغَىٰۤ
en_translation: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds

arabic_text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰۤ
en_translation: once they think they are self-sufficient

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰۤ
en_translation: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺

arabic_text: أَرَءَیۡتَ ٱلَّذِی یَنۡهَىٰ
en_translation: Have you seen the man who prevents

arabic_text: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰۤ
en_translation: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying

arabic_text: أَرَءَیۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ
en_translation: What if this ˹servant˺ is ˹rightly˺ guided

arabic_text: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۤ
en_translation: or encourages righteousness

arabic_text: أَرَءَیۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰۤ
en_translation: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ یَرَىٰ
en_translation: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ یَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِیَةِ
en_translation: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—

arabic_text: نَاصِیَةࣲ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةࣲ
en_translation: a lying, sinful forelock

arabic_text: فَلۡیَدۡعُ نَادِیَهُۥ
en_translation: So let him call his associates

arabic_text: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِیَةَ
en_translation: We will call the wardens of Hell

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَ̅ٱ̅سۡ̅جُ̅دۡ̅ وَٱقۡتَرِب ۩
en_translation: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَنزَلۡنَـٰهُ فِی لَیۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
en_translation: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَیۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is

arabic_text: لَیۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَیۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرࣲ
en_translation: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months

arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِیهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرࣲ
en_translation: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter

arabic_text: سَلَـٰمٌ هِیَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ
en_translation: It is all peace until the break of dawn

arabic_text: لَمۡ یَكُنِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ مُنفَكِّینَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِیَهُمُ ٱلۡبَیِّنَةُ
en_translation: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist ˹from disbelief˺ until the clear proof came to them

arabic_text: رَسُولࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ یَتۡلُوا۟ صُحُفࣰا مُّطَهَّرَةࣰ
en_translation: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of ˹utmost˺ purity

arabic_text: فِیهَا كُتُبࣱ قَیِّمَةࣱ
en_translation: containing upright commandments

arabic_text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَاۤءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَیِّنَةُ
en_translation: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided ˹about his prophethood˺—

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أُمِرُوۤا۟ إِلَّا لِیَعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِینَ لَهُ ٱلدِّینَ حُنَفَاۤءَ وَیُقِیمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَیُؤۡتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَ ٰلِكَ دِینُ ٱلۡقَیِّمَةِ
en_translation: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah ˹alone˺ with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ فِی نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِیَّةِ
en_translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of ˹all˺ beings

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰۤئِكَ هُمۡ خَیۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِیَّةِ
en_translation: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of ˹all˺ beings

arabic_text: جَزَاۤؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۖ رَّضِیَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنۡهُۚ ذَ ٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِیَ رَبَّهُۥ
en_translation: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is ˹only˺ for those in awe of their Lord

arabic_text: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا
en_translation: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking

arabic_text: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا
en_translation: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents

arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا
en_translation: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—

arabic_text: یَوۡمَئِذࣲ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا
en_translation: on that Day the earth will recount everything

arabic_text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا
en_translation: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺

arabic_text: یَوۡمَئِذࣲ یَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتࣰا لِّیُرَوۡا۟ أَعۡمَـٰلَهُمۡ
en_translation: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds

arabic_text: فَمَن یَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَیۡرࣰا یَرَهُۥ
en_translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it

arabic_text: وَمَن یَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةࣲ شَرࣰّا یَرَهُۥ
en_translation: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it

arabic_text: وَٱلۡعَـٰدِیَـٰتِ ضَبۡحࣰا
en_translation: ’ By the galloping, panting horses

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُورِیَـٰتِ قَدۡحࣰا
en_translation: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُغِیرَ ٰتِ صُبۡحࣰا
en_translation: launching raids at dawn

arabic_text: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعࣰا
en_translation: stirring up ˹clouds of˺ dust

arabic_text: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا
en_translation: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودࣱ
en_translation: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَ ٰلِكَ لَشَهِیدࣱ
en_translation: and they certainly attest to this—

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَیۡرِ لَشَدِیدٌ
en_translation: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains

arabic_text: ۞ أَفَلَا یَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِی ٱلۡقُبُورِ
en_translation: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out

arabic_text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِی ٱلصُّدُورِ
en_translation: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ یَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّخَبِیرُۢ
en_translation: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day

arabic_text: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
en_translation: The Striking Disaster

arabic_text: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
en_translation: What is the Striking Disaster

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is

arabic_text: یَوۡمَ یَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths

arabic_text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ
en_translation: and the mountains will be like carded wool

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَ ٰزِینُهُۥ
en_translation: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺

arabic_text: فَهُوَ فِی عِیشَةࣲ رَّاضِیَةࣲ
en_translation: they will be in a life of bliss

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَ ٰزِینُهُۥ
en_translation: And as for those whose scale is light

arabic_text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِیَةࣱ
en_translation: their home will be the abyss

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِیَهۡ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what that is

arabic_text: نَارٌ حَامِیَةُۢ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ a scorching Fire

arabic_text: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
en_translation: Competition for more ˹gains˺ diverts you ˹from Allah˺

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ
en_translation: until you end up in ˹your˺ graves

arabic_text: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: But no! You will soon come to know

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
en_translation: Again, no! You will soon come to know

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡیَقِینِ
en_translation: Indeed, if you were to know ˹your fate˺ with certainty, ˹you would have acted differently˺

arabic_text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِیمَ
en_translation: ˹But˺ you will surely see the Hellfire

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَیۡنَ ٱلۡیَقِینِ
en_translation: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡءَلُنَّ یَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِیمِ
en_translation: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about ˹your worldly˺ pleasures

arabic_text: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ
en_translation: By the ˹passage of˺ time

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِی خُسۡرٍ
en_translation: Surely humanity is in ˹grave˺ loss

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
en_translation: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance

arabic_text: وَیۡلࣱ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةࣲ لُّمَزَةٍ
en_translation: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی جَمَعَ مَالࣰا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
en_translation: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺

arabic_text: یَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥۤ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ
en_translation: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ لَیُنۢبَذَنَّ فِی ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ
en_translation: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher

arabic_text: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ
en_translation: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is

arabic_text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ
en_translation: ˹It is˺ Allah’s kindled Fire

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِی تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡءِدَةِ
en_translation: which rages over the hearts

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا عَلَیۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةࣱ
en_translation: It will be sealed over them

arabic_text: فِی عَمَدࣲ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ
en_translation: ˹tightly secured˺ with long braces

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَیۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡفِیلِ
en_translation: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ یَجۡعَلۡ كَیۡدَهُمۡ فِی تَضۡلِیلࣲ
en_translation: Did He not frustrate their scheme

arabic_text: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ طَیۡرًا أَبَابِیلَ
en_translation: For He sent against them flocks of birds

arabic_text: تَرۡمِیهِم بِحِجَارَةࣲ مِّن سِجِّیلࣲ
en_translation: that pelted them with stones of baked clay

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفࣲ مَّأۡكُولِۭ
en_translation: leaving them like chewed up straw

arabic_text: لِإِیلَـٰفِ قُرَیۡشٍ
en_translation: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh habitually secure—

arabic_text: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَاۤءِ وَٱلصَّیۡفِ
en_translation: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—

arabic_text: فَلۡیَعۡبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَیۡتِ
en_translation: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعࣲ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
en_translation: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear

arabic_text: أَرَءَیۡتَ ٱلَّذِی یُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّینِ
en_translation: Have you seen the one who denies the ˹final˺ Judgment

arabic_text: فَذَ ٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِی یَدُعُّ ٱلۡیَتِیمَ
en_translation: That is the one who repulses the orphan

arabic_text: وَلَا یَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینِ
en_translation: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor

arabic_text: فَوَیۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُصَلِّینَ
en_translation: So woe to those ˹hypocrites˺ who pray

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
en_translation: yet are unmindful of their prayers

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ یُرَاۤءُونَ
en_translation: those who ˹only˺ show off

arabic_text: وَیَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ
en_translation: and refuse to give ˹even the simplest˺ aid

arabic_text: إِنَّاۤ أَعۡطَیۡنَـٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ
en_translation: Indeed, We have granted you ˹O Prophet˺ abundant goodness

arabic_text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ
en_translation: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord ˹alone˺

arabic_text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ
en_translation: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off ˹from any goodness˺

arabic_text: قُلۡ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O you disbelievers

arabic_text: لَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
en_translation: I do not worship what you worship

arabic_text: وَلَاۤ أَنتُمۡ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ
en_translation: nor do you worship what I worship

arabic_text: وَلَاۤ أَنَا۠ عَابِدࣱ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ
en_translation: I will never worship what you worship

arabic_text: وَلَاۤ أَنتُمۡ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ
en_translation: nor will you ever worship what I worship

arabic_text: لَكُمۡ دِینُكُمۡ وَلِیَ دِینِ
en_translation: You have your way, and I have my Way.”

arabic_text: إِذَا جَاۤءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ
en_translation: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺

arabic_text: وَرَأَیۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ یَدۡخُلُونَ فِی دِینِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجࣰا
en_translation: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
en_translation: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance

arabic_text: تَبَّتۡ یَدَاۤ أَبِی لَهَبࣲ وَتَبَّ
en_translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish

arabic_text: مَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
en_translation: Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him

arabic_text: سَیَصۡلَىٰ نَارࣰا ذَاتَ لَهَبࣲ
en_translation: He will burn in a flaming Fire

arabic_text: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ
en_translation: and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling

arabic_text: فِی جِیدِهَا حَبۡلࣱ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ
en_translation: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre

arabic_text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
en_translation: Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺

arabic_text: لَمۡ یَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ یُولَدۡ
en_translation: He has never had offspring, nor was He born

arabic_text: وَلَمۡ یَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ
en_translation: And there is none comparable to Him.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
en_translation: from the evil of whatever He has created

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
en_translation: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِی ٱلۡعُقَدِ
en_translation: and from the evil of those ˹witches casting spells by˺ blowing onto knots

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
en_translation: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
en_translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind

arabic_text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
en_translation: the Master of humankind

arabic_text: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
en_translation: the God of humankind

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ
en_translation: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِی یُوَسۡوِسُ فِی صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
en_translation: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—

arabic_text: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
en_translation: from among jinn and humankind.”
